Daily Events
Flora-Bama
Daily Events
365 days of FUN
Come check out Ladies Night, Membership Night, Free Bingo, Monday through Friday, or one of the many other events during the week at Flora-Bama. Don't forget to visit the
Church
on Sundays where "It's OK to not be OK".
See the full list of daily events below or check out the Annual Events

photoswipe markup
Root element of PhotoSwipe. Must have class pswp.
Background of PhotoSwipe. 
         It's a separate element as animating opacity is faster than rgba().
Slides wrapper with overflow:hidden.
Container that holds slides. 
            PhotoSwipe keeps only 3 of them in the DOM to save memory.
            Don't modify these 3 pswp__item elements, data is added later on.
Default (PhotoSwipeUI_Default) interface on top of sliding area. Can be changed.
Controls are self-explanatory. Order can be changed.
Preloader demo http://codepen.io/dimsemenov/pen/yyBWoR
element will get class pswp__preloader--active when preloader is running

Come See Us
Contact Us
We do not take reservations or call ahead for seating, as all of our restaurants are casual dining, first-come, first-serve restaurants.
Location
17401 Perdido Key Dr.
Perdido Key, FL. 32507
Email
info@florabama.com
Call
(251) 980-5118
Ask Us
We love to hear from you, but first check out our answers to the most asked questions below.
Hack to initialise popups
At 6pm, only those ages 18 and older will be permitted entry. Those who are 18 to 20 years old can stay all night as long as they are in the door by 10PM with no re-entry.
Cover charge will apply daily beginning at 6PM. Those who are 18 to 20 years old can stay all night as long as they are in the door by 10PM with no re-entry.
$5 for 21yrs & older
$20 for 18-21yrs
ATTENTION: The Flora-Bama is located in the state of Florida and Florida law states that we DO NOT accept LA Wallet / Digital ID's. All customers need to have a physical (current) ID to gain entrance into the Flora-Bama.
Daily: Gift Shop - 9am to 2:30am and Flora-Bama Lounge & Oyster Bar - 11am to 2:30am
We're family friendly for all ages every day until 6pm. At 6pm, only those ages 18 and older will be permitted entry. Those who are 18 to 20 years old can stay all night as long as they are in the door by 10PM with no re-entry.
We also have two dine-in restaurants located across the street: Flora-Bama Yacht Club and Flora-Bama Ole River Grill. Both open daily at 11AM and both are family friendly all hours of operation!
• Ole River Grill will be open from 11AM - 9PM Sun-Thurs and 11AM - 10PM Fri - Sat.
• Flora-Bama Yacht Club will be open from 11AM - 9PM Sunday through Thursday and 11AM - 10PM Friday & Saturday.
NO.
The Flora-Bama is located in the state of Florida and Florida law states that we DO NOT accept LA Wallet / Digital ID's. All customers need to have a physical (current) ID to gain entrance into the Flora-Bama.
Forms of ID Accepted:
Current, non-expired driver's license, current passport, military, or state issued. We do not accept any paper ID's or digital ID's.
Yes, of course! You are welcome to utilize the beach behind the Flora-Bama and can walk through to the boardwalk for access beginning at 10AM daily.
NO OUTSIDE ALCOHOL OR COOLERS ALLOWED through our doors or on our premises, though you are welcome to bring your beach bag essentials, chairs, towels etc.
Please note that Food & Alcohol Sales begin daily at 11AM (live music begins daily at 12PM).
Yes. Free bingo is Monday - Friday from 1p-4p in the Tent Stage.
We love bachelor and bachelorette parties! You can visit
HERE
to get some ideas and we look forward to seeing your group at the Flora-Bama.
We appreciate your interest in joining the Flora-Bama music scene! Please use the following link to submit your information to our Entertainment Department and they will contact you back: www.florabama.com/entertainers. You can also send your EPK/email request to booking@florabama.com.
We do ask that you please bear with us as our team acquires a large amount of requests each day from those interested in playing at one of our  Flora-Bama music venues. Hope to see ya around soon! You can also send an email request to booking@florabama.com
Well, of course our recipe is infamous for being a best kept secret... but think of it as an adult frozen milkshake sure to kick up a good time!
Unfortunately, our licensing does not permit us to selll Bushwackers to-go or by the gallon...but we'd love to have you over for some cold snacks!
There are lots of great places to stay and within walking distance or just a short Uber or car ride away! We would suggest MEDITERRANEAN WEST or PHOENIX X, both are beachfront and located adjacent to the Flora-Bama.
You can always look into our local property management companies for availability --> Brett/Robinson (all Phoenix condos in Gulf Shores and Orange Beach), Meyer Real Estate, Kaiser Realty and Luxury Coastal Vacations just to name a few.
Make sure to check out this luxury condo, located at the Mediterranean West next door to the Flora-Bama: https://www.luxurycoastalvacations.com/gulf-coast-vacation-rentals/mediterranean-west-802
We sure do... and Worship on the Water has actually become almost as famous as the bar! Join us on Sunday's for one of our two Worship Services held at 9AM and 11AM under the Tent behind the Flora-Bama. No fancy Sunday dress necessary, feel free to come casual while you enjoy the good word and live music throughout the service. Afterwards, stick around for some grub at either the FLora-Bama Oyster Bar or visit our resturants located across the street: The Flora-Bama Yacht Club and Flora-Bama Ole River Grill, both open daily at 11AM and family friendly all hours of operation.
We are open 365 days a year with live music every day as well. Come on by and meet the Bamily!
The Flora-Bama is a place where we encourage people of all walks of life to gather together, enjoy live music, food, drinks and create lasting memories with friends while making some new friendships along the way. This has historically included our furry friends as well, as the Flora-Bama loves animals and knows that many of our awesome patrons are pet owners (as are our owners!). Upon considering a tremendous amount of factors over a lengthy and difficult process, we have unfortunately decided to no longer allow dogs at the Flora-Bama, Flora-Bama Yacht Club, and Flora-Bama Ole River Grill moving forward. We have come to this decision with the ultimate intent of providing the safest, cleanest, and most positive atmosphere for our patrons to enjoy while on property. We truly appreciate your business and will continue to do our absolute best to create an environment for our customers that translates into lasting and enjoyable memories. Please be patient with us during this transition, as this was a very tough, but necessary choice. We look forward to seeing everyone this season and will miss our K-9 pals!
Yes, there are several areas for you to smoke. Though we do have very strict rules about what you can smoke ... meaning, nothing illegal.
If you're not looking to rent your watersport fun from the Flora-Bama Marina, then you can contact Ike's Beach Service to inquire more info on the Parasailing, Banana Boats and Beach Chair availabilty located beachside behind the Flora-Bama. Ike's Beach Attendants are out there daily (during season) and will be happy to help! You can also find contact information for Ike's Beach Service here: https://www.ikesbeachservice.com/
You have 45 days to return items for a full refund, with or without a receipt. Items must still have their original tags.
Flora-Bama produces more than 100 events every year, so there is limited availability to host outside events. Please answer these questions
HERE
so our event team can follow up with you with more information regarding your request.
Email Us
Please select a subject and one of our Team members will get in touch with you soon.
Join Our Team
Flora-Bama is always seeking great new members
Apply Here

Events
Annual Events of the
Flora-Bama
The most famous beach bar in the country, the Flora-Bama Lounge, has numerous Annual Events during the year. Our regular guests plan their schedules around our beach concerts, fishing rodeos, chili cook-offs, marathons and much more. Check out the schedule below for the complete list. If you would like to know about our WEEKLY EVENTS please click
HERE
Some events may be ticketed and you can purchase those through our website
HERE
.
Slide title
Polar Bear Dip
Button
Slide title
Oktoberfest
Button
Slide title

Legendary Events At
Flora-Bama
Polar Bear Dip
January 1st, 2025
After celebrating New Year's Eve at the Flora-Bama there is only one way to start the new year .... by taking a plunge into the Gulf of Mexico with a few thousand of your friends.
Read More
Super Chili Bowl Cook-Off
Saturday, February 8th, 2025
The Chili Bowl Cook-Off raises funds for the American Cancer Society. Enter your team for a great event or come taste the fantastic recipes. All proceeds go to charity.
Read More
Boozy Bee Spelling Bee
Sunday, March 9th
Have you been personally victimized by a grade school spelling bee that left you questioning whether you really knew English? Get your revenge by signing up for our Boozy Adult Spelling Bee!
Read More
Flora-Bama Annual Beach Run/Walk
Saturday, March 15th, 2025
Annual Beach Run/Walk for America's Warriors will be the best run of the year!  The start and end point is right here at the Flora-Bama and we run entirely on the beach!
Read More
Mullet Man Triathlon
Saturday, April 12th, 2025
The Mullet Man Triathlon has proven to be a definite addition to the Annual Interstate Mullet Toss® and Gulf Coast’s Greatest Beach Party . This is our 24th Annual Mullet Man Triathlon!
Read More
Easter Egg Hunt & Bunny Drop
Saturday, April 19th, 2025
Happy Easter to everybunny! Kids' crafts and face painting in the tent. Festivities will begin at 11AM.
Read More
Mullet Swing Golf Classic
Wednesday, April 23rd, 2025
Now THIS is the way to play golf! The 25th Annual Mullet Swing Golf Classic will be a 4-person scramble. Maximum handicap per player is 30. This will fill up fast so book your team!
Read More
Interstate Mullet Toss & Beach Party
April 25th-27th, 2025
The Interstate Mullet Toss & Gulf Coast’s Greatest Beach Party is legendary. What started as just a reason to party has become one of the biggest beach parties on the coast.
Read More
Bikini & Hot Body Contest
Held on: Mullet Toss Weekend (Friday & Saturday), Memorial Day Weekend, 4th of July Weekend and Labor Day Weekend
It wouldn't be a beach bar without a few bikini contest. Top 3 finalist have a chance to win $5,000 so register now.
Read More
The Bushwacker's 50th B-Day Bash
May 31st, 2025
Happy birthday, you delicious adult masterpiece! Everyone's favorite cocktail, the world famous Flora-Bama Bushwacker is turning 50 and we're throwing a party to celebrate!
Read More
Flora-Bama Fishing Rodeo
June 6,7  & Awards On 8th, 2025
The 'Funnest' Fishing Tournament on the Gulf Coast -  the Annual Fishing Rodeo is the "Every Mans" fishing rodeo! Just like the Flora-Bama, you don't have to be a VIP to fish with us!
Read More
Flora-Bama Freedom Run
Saturday, July 5th, 2025
This patriotic run features two courses: The 4-Mile Run/Walk Course or the 1-Mile Fun Run/Walk! Break out your best red, white and blue attire to make this run scream AMERICA!
Read More
July 4th Party
July 4th
The 4th of July Party at Flora-Bama is Legendary! Come to the beach and enjoy a Bikini Contest, Live Music, Freedom Run, fireworks with Red-White-Blue fun!
Read More
Sandstock
Saturday, August 9th
Flora-Bama's ode to Woodstock - join us for Sandstock! Wear your favorite hippie attire on Saturday, August 9th, as the Flora-Bama goes back in time! Festivities are all day with live music from the 60's, themed food, and decor.
Read More
Bulls On The Beach
Sept. 4th - 6th, 2025
Bulls On The Beach is one of Flora-Bama's most anticipated events of the year! Bring the family out to experience the ultimate adrenaline rush with three nights of live rodeo action.
Read More
OktoberFest
Sunday, Oct. 12th, 2025
Break out your lederhosen for Flora-Bama's Oktoberfest. A great event for beer and food lovers. Earn a free stein and enjoy a complimentary German food from the buffet.
Read More
Halloween Contest
October 31st
On All Hallow's Eve, the Flora-Bama is THE place to be! Better bring your costume "A Game" our contenders go over the top to compete for prizes in our annual Halloween Costume contest.
Read More
Frank Brown's Songwriters Festival
Nov. 6th - 16th, 2025
The Annual Frank Brown International Songwriters’ Festival will feature more than 200 nationally acclaimed songwriters. The festival is  for songwriters and musicians from all over the world.
Read More
Flora-Bama's Thanksgiving Potluck
Thanksgiving Day - Thursday, November 27th, 2025
We are so thankful each year for the wonderful guests, fantastic team members and amazing surroundings. The Flora-Bama invites you to eat, drink and be thankful at our tradition.
Read More
Santa Drop At Flora-Bama
Saturday, December 6th, 2025
We kick-off the Christmas holidays with our annual Santa Drop here at the World Famous Flora-Bama!  See Santa skydive onto our white sandy beaches then jump in line in the Tent for Santa pics!
Read More
Annual Christmas Potluck
Christmas Day, Dec. 25th
Whether you have been naughty or nice the Flora-Bama Christmas Potluck is a time for gathering of friends and family. Just bring a side dish and friend we have the meats covered.
Read More
Make It To The Line Run/Walk
Saturday, December 27th, 2025
Run, jog, walk or crawl at the Annual Make It To The Line 4-miler fun run/walk. This is a great family event and proceeds go to the Secret Santa Fund to benefit local families in need.
Read More
Flora-Bama's New Year's Eve Bash
December 31st, 2025
The Flora-Bama is THE place to be on New Year’s Eve! Live music on all three stages. Food, party favors, and a midnight champagne toast to good times On The Line as we ring in the New Year, Flora-Bama style!
Read More

navigation placeholders
About Us
THE LEGEND OF THE
FLORA-BAMA
There are many stories about how the most famous beach bar in the country, the Flora-Bama Lounge, became the iconic location it is today. Some of the stories are even true and a few others were thought up on a local bar stool. The truth is that in 1962 the State of Florida gave the State of Alabama two miles of beach front land in return for the construction of the Perdido Pass Bridge. The Tampary family (Father Ted with sons Connie and Tony) decided to build a small bar and package store on the new State Line. The Flora-Bama was originally constructed in 1964, two years after the road was completed. In the early days of the Flora-Bama, the lounge was practically the only thing in the area. As traffic began to increase along the new highway, business grew and the lounge grew to match it with new construction added piecemeal to accommodate the larger crowds. At the time it was established Escambia County, Florida, in which it is located was "wet" while across the line Baldwin County, Alabama, was "dry".
The Tamparys created a camaraderie rarely found among people of all ages and walks of life. Joseph Gilchrist purchased the tiny lounge and package store on April 17, 1978, and made live music a daily staple. Joined in 1986, by partner Pat McClellan, together they created calendar events like the “Interstate Mullet Toss” and the “Frank Brown Songwriter’s Festival,” named after the early, imposing night watchman.
In 2009, John McInnis and Cameron Price became co-owners of the Flora-Bama, along with Joe and Pat, to carry it into the next 50 years. Together these four owners have carried on the tradition of making the Country's Best Beach Bar a place where everyone feels comfortable and leaves smiling. Today the live music at the Flora-Bama consist of local favorites to Platinum selling recording artist. The events range from chili cookoffs and fishing rodeos to the Annual Mullet Toss and big beach front concerts. The best part is there is always someone and something different going on at the Flora-Bama every day and you never know who is going to be sitting next to you.
Flora-Bama
The Owners
Building a legendary location takes dedicated ownership who cares for the team, community, quality and our beloved guests.
Say Hello To Joe, Pat, John and Cam
Around the Flora-Bama the owners like to be called by their first names. They are dedicated to making every day better for our community. They provide support to local charities and provide assistance to returning troops. Next time you are at The Flora-Bama come say hello.
Best
Honky Tonk
Oyster Bar
Live Music
Sunset Viewing
Dance Spot
Bushwackers
On The Beach
Songs About The Flora-Bama
Yes, many people have written and recorded songs about the Flora-Bama over the years. As we always say " you never know who you are going to see at the Flora-Bama" or who is going to mention it in a book, song or video. Here are some famous examples.
Slide title

The Flora-Bama has been described in many ways. Some call us a beach bar. Others have mentioned live music, oyster bar, dance floors, beach views and so many other adjectives. As long as you like fun for all ages in a fantastic location on the beach then feel free to describe the Flora-Bama how you like. BUT we like to say that we are the ONLY Honky Tonk On The Beach! See how news from around the nation describes the Flora-Bama by clicking
HERE
.
FLORA-BAMA MOTTO
"To always be responsive and sensitive to the human dignity of others. To grant equal respect to all who enter the Flora-Bama, expecting the same in return. To ensure our guests enjoy the magic of the Flora-Bama, leave safe and happy and come to visit us again with new friends."
GIVES BACK
The Flora-Bama encourages everyone to invest in their community and the well-being of others. Here are a few of the organizations we assist annually. In total the Flora-Bama provides donations to over 30 charities each year.
Youth Reach
This faith-based long-term, residential ministry offers a healthy and stable environment to receive emotional healing and valuable life skills.
Read More
St Jude Childre's Hospital
St. Jude is leading the way the world understands, treats and defeats childhood cancer and other life-threatening diseases.
Read More
Leukemia Society
Cure leukemia, lymphoma, Hodgkin's disease and myeloma, and improve the quality of life of patients and their families.
Read More
